document.full_text: ivory coast's president alassane ouattara on friday ordered soldiers from all sides of the country's conflict to return to their barracks in an effort to restore stability.
document.title: ouattara orders ivorian forces back to barracks
lines_and_colors: ivory coast's president alassane ouattara on friday ordered soldiers from all sides of the country's conflict to return to their barracks in an effort to restore stability.
